titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for recalling his Maiesties subiects from the seminaries beyond the seas, and putting the lawes against Iesuites and popish priests in execution.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by I.L. and W.T. for Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Giuen at the court of Woodstocke the foureteenth day of August, in the first yeere of his Maiesties raigne of great Britaine, France, and Ireland.
The imprint is false; in fact printed in London by Norton and Bill (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
